Reviews.Title: 25ft High quality camera cable
Reviews.Author: sonny
Reviews.Content: this cable is really durable, strong and excellent picture quality and I get 100 percent signal. if anyone want to get better picture and strong cable pls get it from this companyhttp://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B004PA9PVG/ref=cm_cr_rev_prod_imgi have seen lot of cheap cable. they will get cut when running through drop ceilingor in the attic. and the picture quality is fuzzy and the connectors are bad. some times u don't get signal and u have to ziggle the cable connector ends to get thesignal

ProductInfo.Features:
100 % Pure copper cable
Easy to Install
ProductInfo.Name: 25ft Surveillance camera cable with video and power connectors
